definition: Stamford Raffles (1781-1826), British statesman and founder of the city of Singapore/surname Raffles
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
Stamford Raffles (1781-1826), British statesman and founder of the city of Singapore
pinyin: Si1 tan3 fu2 · Lai2 fo2 shi4

sentences.english: Before Raffles came to Singapore, we belonged to the Johor Sultanate.
sentences.chinese: 莱佛士来之前，新加坡属于柔佛王朝。

sentences.english: Stamford Raffles ' plan was to develop it into a thriving business sector.
sentences.chinese: 莱佛士当年计划将其发展成一个繁荣的商业地带。

sentences.english: Does it mean then that the island has no history prior to the arrival of Stamford Raffles?
sentences.chinese: 那么，莱佛士到新加坡之前，新加坡就没有历史吗？

sentences.english: User management page to view user's past winnings, and raffles.
sentences.chinese: 用户管理页面，查看用户的过去奖金，和莱佛士。

definition: Changi, area in the east of Singapore, where Singapore Changi Airport is located
